pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========PluginCode===========- license: Apache-2.0- copyright: copyright (c) nexB. Inc. and others- homepage_url: https://github.com/nexB/plugincode- keywords: plugins, utilities, scancode-toolkit, plugincodePluginCode is a library that provides plugable functionality with plugins, including Click plugins.It is used by ScanCode toolkit and related projectsVisit https://aboutcode.org and https://github.com/nexB/ for support and download.To set up the development environment:: source configureTo run unit tests:: pytest -vvs -n 2To clean up development environment:: ./configure --clean
